metadata.title: Heroicons Implementation Guide
metadata.purpose: - Step-by-step Heroicons implementation instructions - Installation and setup procedures - Code examples and usage patterns - UI consistency and professional design implementation

section.name: overview
section.title: Overview
section.content: We have successfully implemented Heroicons to replace emoji-based buttons throughout the SmartPack application, providing a more professional and consistent UI experience.

section.name: installation
section.title: Installation
section.content: Required: You need to install the Heroicons package manually:
If you encounter npm issues, try:

list.item: Edit button: Added `PencilIcon` next to the "Edit" text
Update Full Packing List: Replaced emoji with `ArrowPathIcon`
Update Suggestions Only: Replaced emoji with `SparklesIcon`
Loading states: Added spinning animation to icons when updating
AI Robot: Replaced emoji with `CpuChipIcon` (16x16 size)
Refresh button: Replaced emoji with animated `ArrowPathIcon`
Add buttons: Added `PlusIcon` next to "Add" text
Remove buttons: Replaced symbol with `XMarkIcon`
Tip section: Replaced emoji with a custom star SVG icon
Updated test to check for descriptive text instead of emoji
All tests continue to pass with the new implementation

ordered_list.item: Professional Appearance: Consistent, scalable vector icons
Better Accessibility: Proper screen reader support
Customization: Icons can be styled with CSS (color, size, animation)
Performance: Optimized SVGs instead of emoji rendering
Consistency: All icons follow the same design language
Animation Support: Spinning refresh icons when loading

list.item: Package: `@heroicons/react` v2.0.18
Icon Style: Outline icons (24px base with custom sizing)
Integration: Seamless with Tailwind CSS classes
Bundle Impact: Minimal - only imports used icons
All existing tests pass
SuggestionsPanel tests updated for new structure
No breaking changes to functionality
Accessibility maintained with proper ARIA labels

section.name: next_steps
section.title: Next Steps
section.content: After installing the package with `npm install @heroicons/react`, the application will have:

list.item: Professional, consistent iconography
Better user experience
Improved accessibility
Smoother animations and interactions

section.content: The implementation is complete and ready for use once the package is installed!
